QuestData.Title: Rediscovering Your Roots
QuestData.Description: My stocks are presently sufficient, but I'll need plenty of razorthorn roots to keep up with the demand.$b$bCollecting the roots is difficult, but I know a special method of extraction.$b$bUsing the glands of the Razorthorn flayers, one can control a ravager there and use it to expose a root.$b$bTo find the roots, travel to Outland and fly northeast from Shattrath until you reach Razorthorn Rise.$b$bReturn to me, $n, once you have collected five of the roots.
QuestData.LogDescription: Mar'nah at Sun's Reach Harbor wants you to travel to Razorthorn Rise in Outlands, collect 5 Razorthorn Roots, and return to her.
QuestData.CompletionText: Really, $n, I'm far too busy for idle chatter.$b$bLet me know when you've gathered those roots.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $n.$b$bThank you again for your help!
